i use a lil npm script.  i think the most time consuming part are the path names.  what are you finding to be the most time consuming?

one way i've gotten around this without having to use local-dev is to create a separate css file per module and include it as a "Linked File". Then - inside the CSS file you created - import a CSS file that contains HUBL variables for your project and reference them in your CSS file. A little hacky - but it works - and as long as you structure your design tools area right and name the files correclty - its manageable
and functionally - it works in the same manner as the CSS panel in the module editor - (only will inlcude that CSS file if the module is loaded) etc..
